name: Tyrant's Realm (Alpha version)
description:
Tyrant's Realm is a challenging action roguelike.

Fill your arsenal with weapons and armor each with their unique gameplay mechanics. Tread carefully in this dark fantasy world because every enemy you face could be your end.


Features:
Find blueprints and gather coins to unlock new weapons and armor to aid you in your adventures. The enemies are challenging and require different strategies to defeat. The game features room-based random generated levels.

The game is currently in very early alpha stage and features one level with a separate boss fight level.



The game will be released on Steam Early Access Summer 2023. We are committed to the development and are busy creating more content as you're reading this!

Join our Discord server to chat with the community and be part of the development by giving valuable feedback and suggestions.

Support the development by wishlisting Tyrant's Realm on Steam!
